DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance investigational CooperVision silicone hydrogel lens compare currently-marketed silicone hydrogel contact lens 30 day daily lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation DW Silicone Hydrogel Lens Compared DW Silicone Hydrogel Lens
DOC.criteria: 1 . Be least 18 year age date evaluation study . 2 . Not use ocular medication 3 . Have selfreported full eye examination within 2 year . 4 . Have : read Informed Consent give explanation Informed Consent indicate understand Informed Consent sign Informed Consent document . 5 . Be willing able adhere instruction set forth protocol able keep specified appointment . 6 . Be adapt , current fulltime silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer . An adapted fulltime wearer define wear contact lenses daily basis least 8 hour per day least one month prior participation study . 7 . Possess wearable visually functional eyeglass . 8 . Be good general health , base his/her knowledge . 9 . Require spectacle lens power 1.00 6.00 diopter sphere 0.75 diopter refractive astigmatism order best spherical equivalent power 6.50 less . 10 . Be willing wear contact lenses eye . 11 . Have manifest refraction Snellen visual acuity ( VA ) equal good 20/25 ( less equal LogMAR 0.10 ) eye . 12 . Upon complete fit process lens wear study , contact lens Snellen VA equal well 20/30 eye . 1 . Wearing lens monovision modality unwilling fit distance lenses eye . NOTE : Subjects may wear lens monovision modality time study interfere visual acuity analysis . 2 . Any active participation another oneday clinical trial within 7 day prior study another dispense trial within 30 day prior study . 3 . Currently pregnant ( best subject 's knowledge ) , lactate planning pregnancy within next month . 4 . Has know sensitivity ingredient use counter contact lens care approve use study . 5 . Previous refractive surgery/anterior segment surgery ; current previous orthokeratology treatment irregular cornea . 6 . Is aphakic pseudophakic . 7 . Unable achieve satisfactory fit lens design use study 8 . Ocular systemic disease , limited : anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) , glaucoma , Sjögren 's syndrome , lupus erythematosus , sclerodermia , keratoconus type II diabetes . 9 . The need topical ocular medication medication might contradict contact lens wear would require lens remove day . 10 . The presence clinically anterior segment infection , inflammation abnormality ; iritis ; infection eye , lid , associate structure . 11 . A history herpetic keratitis . 12 . A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) active corneal ulcer , corneal infiltrates fungal infection . 13 . A history papillary conjunctivitis interfere contact lens wear . 14 . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear , include limited : Pathological dry eye associate dry eye symptom decrease tear level punctuate stain > grade 2 Pterygium Corneal scar within visual axis Corneal edema corneal stain ≥ grade 2 Neovascularization ghost vessel > 1.0 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) > grade 2 . Seborrheic eczema , seborrheic conjunctivitis blepharitis
